title: Jamf unveils new ‘Fundamentals’ plan for businesses deploying Apple devices
content:
Jamf, the standard in Apple Enterprise Management, announced today its new plan to help businesses manage and secure their devices. This new plan, Jamf Fundamentals, offers new capabilities for protecting small and midsize businesses while using Apple products.

more…

The post Jamf unveils new ‘Fundamentals’ plan for businesses deploying Apple devices appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Jamf Fundamentals offers new capabilities for protecting small and midsize businesses with Apple products.
